name: DODGEBALL (itch) (omn0mn0m, Sam Hotchkiss)
description:
Local Multiplayer:

Player 1:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Throw Ball

Player 2:

  • Arrow keys - Movement
  • CTRL - Throw Bal

Online Multiplayer:

Player:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Throw Ball

Hosting a multiplayer game: You must port forward 8910.

Joining a multiplayer game: Enter the host player's public IP address.

Map sprites and player sprites from Miziziziz.
